examples.example: 在这一节生动有趣的课堂上，同学们都听得格外认真。

translate.english: In this lively and interesting class, all the students listen extremely carefully.

examples.example: 我参加了一节非常有意义的公益活动，收获满满。

translate.english: I participated in a very meaningful public welfare activity and gained a lot.

examples.example: 我上了一节精彩绝伦的音乐课，沉浸在美妙的旋律中。

translate.english: I had an extremely wonderful music lesson and was immersed in the wonderful melody.
